metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2750 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Open redirect vulnerability in URL-related API functions in Drupal 6.xbefore 6.35 and 7.x before 7.35 allows remote attackers to redirect usersto arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks via vectors involvingthe "//" initial sequence.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
